24/7 Plumbing, Heating & Gas Repair

MS Gas Engineering Services, we understand that plumbing, heating, and boiler issues can occur at any time, day or night, and that they can cause significant inconvenience and discomfort. That’s why we offer our clients the services of our highly recommended, in-house gas safe plumbers who are available 24 hours a day, 7 days a week.

About Us

95% First-Time Fix Rate

MS Gas Engineering Services, we understand that our clients have busy schedules, and that’s why we prioritise offering flexible appointment times. Whether you need us to work around your school runs or other commitments, we’re happy to accommodate your unique scheduling needs. We’re also available throughout the night to handle urgent emergencies and uncontainable water leaks, ensuring that you receive prompt and efficient service whenever you need it.
Our team of gas safe plumbing and heating engineers is professional, friendly, and experienced, and we’re proud to say that we fix over 95% of our same-day repairs on the first visit. By doing so, we aim to save you time and money, as well as minimize the disruption caused by plumbing and heating issues.

Boiler Switching off

Low pressures, faulty thermostats, frozen condensate, faulty pumps, overheating and blockages are some off the reasons why your boiler repeatedly decides to shut off. Our in-house local gas safe registered engineers will take a closer look at your boiler to diagnose the root cause of the problem and get your boiler up and running again in no time!

Water Leaks

Water leaks may occur due to several reasons such as leaking radiators or boilers, leaking taps, showers, or baths, corrosion or cracks within joints or water pipes, and blockages causing accumulated water to put excessive pressure on pipes. Water can also leak from your boiler and this leakage can turn into a bigger problem for you like damaging electrical components within the boiler.

Boiler Kettling

Boiler kettling refers to an unusual popping and gurgling noise that comes from your boiler when it is running. These annoying noises indicate three major issues which may be the accumulation of limescale, leaks, or overheating. Nevertheless, the good news is that this disturbing sound can be fixed, so there is no need to panic.

In-House Gas Safe Engineers

MS Gas Engineering Services, we prioritise the safety of our clients, which is why all of our boiler experts and local, in-house gas safe heating engineers are members of the Gas Safe Register. This means that they are qualified to carry out all gas work, and they have the knowledge of the necessary protocols to follow while doing so.

To ensure that our clients can trust our engineers, we provide them with Gas Safe Register ID cards that can be easily verified using our Gas Safe number 942442 . This provides peace of mind to our clients, knowing that they are dealing with professionals who are committed to safety and following the proper procedures.

We take pride in our commitment to quality service and safety, and our Gas Safe Register membership is just one of the ways in which we demonstrate this commitment. So, if you need work done, you can rely on us to provide you with a safe and efficient service.

Services

What our customers are saying...

“I can’t thank Ms Gas Engineering Services! Our boiler broke down during a cold snap, and they sent an engineer the same day. He was friendly, efficient, and got it working in no time. The fixed monthly price makes budgeting easy. Highly recommended!”

Jack D., CEO

Incredibly fast and reliable service—arrived the same day I reported the leak. Provided a brand new tap included in the price and even gave a discount. Excellent workmanship, very polite and professional. I’m extremely happy and would highly recommend them!

Nina A., Huddersfield

“The team at Ms Gas Engineering Services! is brilliant. I’ve used them for emergency plumbing and regular boiler servicing, and they never disappoint. Fast response, great communication, and no hidden fees. I feel secure knowing help is just a call away 24/7.”

Liam W., Bradford

“From the first call, Ms Gas Engineering Services impressed me. Friendly customer service, fast same-day callout, and a boiler repair done right the first time. I love that they don’t use subcontractors—it really shows in the quality of their work and best services.”

Emma T., Leeds

Why MS Gas Services?

MS Gas Engineering Services, we understand that plumbing and heating emergencies require prompt and efficient service, which is why we aim to react to your callouts at the fastest speed possible. We promise to provide you with same-day services across all our coverage areas of Leeds, Bradford and the rest of West Yorkshire, ensuring that you receive the assistance you need when you need it.

We take pride in employing all of our local plumbing and heating experts in-house, which means that we don’t rely on sub-contractors like some of our competitors. This allows us to provide transparent services without any hidden surprises, saving you both time and money.

When you choose MS Gas Engineering Services, you can trust us to provide you with reliable and efficient services, no matter the situation.

  • 24 hour a day UK based help desk, open 365 days
  • Live uber style engineer tracking
  • Live updates on your engineer’s progress
  • Two-hour response time for reactive and emergency work
  • DBS checked engineers

Our Servises

Keep your rental property in top condition with our flexible landlord plans. Easily customise your cover by selecting from a range of essential services, including boiler repairs, annual servicing, and emergency support.

🏠 Boiler & central heating repairs

Expert boiler and central heating repairs by certified engineers. Fast, reliable service to restore warmth and comfort to your home—available 24/7 across West Yorkshire.

🛠 Unlimited callouts

Enjoy unlimited callouts with all our plans. Get 24/7 access to expert engineers for repairs whenever you need them, with no extra charges or hidden fees. 

🔥 Boiler breakdown

In the event of a boiler breakdown, our expert engineers respond quickly to restore heat and hot water—available 24/7 with parts and labour included in your plan.

♨️ Central heating system

Our central heating system cover includes repairs to radiators, pipes, and controls. Keep your home warm and efficient with fast, expert service from our certified engineers.

🧾 Boiler controls

Our cover includes repairs to boiler controls such as thermostats and timers, ensuring your heating system runs efficiently and keeps your home comfortable all year round.

🧪 Gas supply pipe

Our plans include coverage for your internal gas supply pipe, ensuring quick repairs for leaks or faults to keep your home safe, warm, and fully functional.

⚡ Plumbing

Professional plumbing services for leaks, blockages, and pipe repairs. Fast, reliable solutions available 24/7 to keep your home’s water system running smoothly and safely.

🛠️ Landlord Gas Safety Inspection

Ensure your rental property complies with legal safety standards with our thorough Landlord Gas Safety Inspections, conducted by qualified engineers for your peace of mind.

Trusted by industry innovators worldwide
